snippet: Traditional knuckleballers have floated their pitches to the plate, but R. A. Dickey’s knuckleballs come in considerably faster.
abstract: Traditional knuckleball pitchers have floated their pitches to the plate, but New York Mets pitcher R A Dickey's knuckleballs come in considerably faster; Dickey is currently the only knuckleballer in the majors.
lead_paragraph: Traditional knuckleballers have floated their pitches to the plate, but R. A. Dickey’s knuckleballs come in considerably faster.

headline.seo: R. A. Dickey, Master of the Knuckler
headline.main: Otherworldly Pitch Meets Its Jedi Master
headline.print_headline: Otherworldly Pitch Meets Its Jedi Master
